ygData.subject: Folded Sheet of Metal
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, I would like to know if someone arrive to make: Folded Sheet of Metal I try Large Brick of ore with Flask of Water (Does not combine) I try Large Brick
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,

I would like to know if someone arrive to make:

Folded Sheet of Metal

I try Large Brick of ore with Flask of Water (Does not combine)
I try Large Brick of ore with Flask of Water (Does not combine)
I try Block of ore with Flask of Water (Does not combine)
I try 2 Block of ore with Flask of Water (Does not combine)
I try 3 Block of ore with Flask of Water (Does not combine)

Thanks in Advance for the answers.

Soldric UndeadNightmare of Felwithe, Officer of Fellowship of Faydark.
Tunare (The Mother of All) will protect us.
(Karana Server)
Email: g.koenig@... ICQ: 5506711
